Articles.Content:
When money will be added (and a bit of multiplayer), it will be a nice idea to reward people making good, usefull and popular ships/subassemblies, to earn money on it by selling the design (=the craft file itself).

Example:

Munshine lifters by wayfare.

I use them a lot to send my stuffes into orbit, so I should have first bought the design to get access to all subassemblies in my VAB.

This will allow to create another kind of profitable business.

(note for paranoids: of course there will be always morons who cheat and try to find any tiny issue to earn virtual money or whatever, they can just go to hell if they're not smart enough to edit theirs saves file and add what they want to it)
